name: @spacetradersapi/rt-sdk
description: SDK for the Real-time Spacetraders API

scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -rf dist && microbundle --tsconfig tsconfig.json --no-sourcemap
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run build && npm run publish

author: art@spacetraders.io
